The ingredients in Clearwayz have been carefully selected based on their history of safety and efficacy for supporting immune function, respiratory and sinus health. Each capsule of Clearwayz uses Targeted Cellular Technology, a patented five phase process that maximizes the cellular absorption of milligram amounts of amino acids and antioxidants which help support healthy sinus and immune system activity by eliminating the free radicals that contribute to inflammation.
